description: Try our easy to follow Tabbouleh recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Vegetarian,Vegan,Peanut free
name: Tabbouleh Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 ripe tomatoes, seeded, and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Put the bulgur in a large bowl. Pour in enough boiling water to cover. Let stand about 10 minutes, or until the grains are swollen and tender. Drain in a fine wire sieve, rinse in cold water, and drain again.
Whisk the oil and lemon juice in a large bowl. Stir in bulgur. Season with salt and pepper.
Just before serving, mix in the scallions, parsley, and mint.
Arrange lettuce leaves on a serving dish. Spoon portions of tabbouleh into the leaves, scatter the diced tomatoes over the top and serve at room temperature.
